text:
As per http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-oauth-assertions-10

A new and from a brief look a very generic grant type with two orthogonal purposes, client auth and as auth grants. Need to check spec maturity and research whether it can simply be added as 1 or 2 new grant types.
title: OAuth 2 Server - Assertions
